Provides a Cloud Config Aggregate Config Rule resource.

For information about Cloud Config Aggregate Config Rule and how to use it, see [What is Aggregate Config Rule](https://help.aliyun.com/).

> **NOTE:** Available in v1.124.0+.

### Inputs

The AggregateConfigRule resource accepts the following [input]({{< relref "/docs/intro/concepts/inputs-outputs" >}}) properties:

        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>

{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="configruletriggertypes_csharp">
<a href="#configruletriggertypes_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Config<wbr>Rule<wbr>Trigger<wbr>Types</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The trigger type of the rule. Valid values: `ConfigurationItemChangeNotification`: The rule is triggered upon configuration changes. `ScheduledNotification`: The rule is triggered as scheduled.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="resourcetypesscopes_csharp">
<a href="#resourcetypesscopes_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Resource<wbr>Types<wbr>Scopes</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">List&lt;string&gt;</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Resource types to be evaluated. [Alibaba Cloud services that support Cloud Config.](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/en/doc-detail/127411.htm)
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="risklevel_csharp">
<a href="#risklevel_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Risk<wbr>Level</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">int</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The risk level of the resources that are not compliant with the rule. Valid values:  `1`: critical `2`: warning `3`: info.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="sourceidentifier_csharp">
<a href="#sourceidentifier_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Source<wbr>Identifier</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The identifier of the rule. For a managed rule, the value is the name of the managed rule. For a custom rule, the value is the ARN of the custom rule. Using managed rules, refer to [List of Managed rules.](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/en/doc-detail/127404.htm)
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="sourceowner_csharp">
<a href="#sourceowner_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Source<wbr>Owner</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Specifies whether you or Alibaba Cloud owns and manages the rule. Valid values: `CUSTOM_FC`: The rule is a custom rule and you own the rule. `ALIYUN`: The rule is a managed rule and Alibaba Cloud owns the rule.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="description_csharp">
<a href="#description_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Description</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The description of the rule.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="excluderesourceidsscope_csharp">
<a href="#excluderesourceidsscope_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Exclude<wbr>Resource<wbr>Ids<wbr>Scope</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The rule monitors excluded resource IDs, multiple of which are separated by commas, only applies to rules created based on managed rules, , custom rule this field is empty.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="inputparameters_csharp">
<a href="#inputparameters_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Input<wbr>Parameters</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Dictionary&lt;string, object&gt;</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The settings map of the input parameters for the rule.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="maximumexecutionfrequency_csharp">
<a href="#maximumexecutionfrequency_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Maximum<wbr>Execution<wbr>Frequency</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The frequency of the compliance evaluations. Valid values:  `One_Hour`, `Three_Hours`, `Six_Hours`, `Twelve_Hours`, `TwentyFour_Hours`. System default value is `TwentyFour_Hours` and valid when the `config_rule_trigger_types` is `ScheduledNotification`.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="regionidsscope_csharp">
<a href="#regionidsscope_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Region<wbr>Ids<wbr>Scope</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The rule monitors region IDs, separated by commas, only applies to rules created based on managed rules.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="resourcegroupidsscope_csharp">
<a href="#resourcegroupidsscope_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Resource<wbr>Group<wbr>Ids<wbr>Scope</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The rule monitors resource group IDs, separated by commas, only applies to rules created based on managed rules.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="tagkeyscope_csharp">
<a href="#tagkeyscope_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Tag<wbr>Key<wbr>Scope</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The rule monitors the tag key, only applies to rules created based on managed rules.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="tagvaluescope_csharp">
<a href="#tagvaluescope_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Tag<wbr>Value<wbr>Scope</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The rule monitors the tag value, use with the TagKeyScope options. only applies to rules created based on managed rules.
{{% /md %}}</dd></dl>

{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="tagkeyscope_go">

        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The rule monitors the tag key, only applies to rules created based on managed rules.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="tagvaluescope_go">
<a href="#tagvaluescope_go" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Tag<wbr>Value<wbr>Scope</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The rule monitors the tag value, use with the TagKeyScope options. only applies to rules created based on managed rules.
{{% /md %}}</dd></dl>

</span>

        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The identifier of the rule. For a managed rule, the value is the name of the managed rule. For a custom rule, the value is the ARN of the custom rule. Using managed rules, refer to [List of Managed rules.](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/en/doc-detail/127404.htm)
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="sourceowner_nodejs">
<a href="#sourceowner_nodejs" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">source<wbr>Owner</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Specifies whether you or Alibaba Cloud owns and manages the rule. Valid values: `CUSTOM_FC`: The rule is a custom rule and you own the rule. `ALIYUN`: The rule is a managed rule and Alibaba Cloud owns the rule.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">

</span>

        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>

The following state arguments are supported:


{{% choosable language csharp %}}
<dl class="resources-properties"><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_aggregateconfigrulename_csharp">
<a href="#state_aggregateconfigrulename_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Aggregate<wbr>Config<wbr>Rule<wbr>Name</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The name of the rule.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_aggregatorid_csharp">
<a href="#state_aggregatorid_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Aggregator<wbr>Id</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The Aggregator Id.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_configruletriggertypes_csharp">
<a href="#state_configruletriggertypes_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Config<wbr>Rule<wbr>Trigger<wbr>Types</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The trigger type of the rule. Valid values: `ConfigurationItemChangeNotification`: The rule is triggered upon configuration changes. `ScheduledNotification`: The rule is triggered as scheduled.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_description_csharp">
<a href="#state_description_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Description</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The description of the rule.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_excluderesourceidsscope_csharp">
<a href="#state_excluderesourceidsscope_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Exclude<wbr>Resource<wbr>Ids<wbr>Scope</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The rule monitors excluded resource IDs, multiple of which are separated by commas, only applies to rules created based on managed rules, , custom rule this field is empty.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_inputparameters_csharp">
<a href="#state_inputparameters_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Input<wbr>Parameters</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Dictionary&lt;string, object&gt;</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The settings map of the input parameters for the rule.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_maximumexecutionfrequency_csharp">
<a href="#state_maximumexecutionfrequency_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Maximum<wbr>Execution<wbr>Frequency</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The frequency of the compliance evaluations. Valid values:  `One_Hour`, `Three_Hours`, `Six_Hours`, `Twelve_Hours`, `TwentyFour_Hours`. System default value is `TwentyFour_Hours` and valid when the `config_rule_trigger_types` is `ScheduledNotification`.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_regionidsscope_csharp">
<a href="#state_regionidsscope_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Region<wbr>Ids<wbr>Scope</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The rule monitors region IDs, separated by commas, only applies to rules created based on managed rules.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_resourcegroupidsscope_csharp">
<a href="#state_resourcegroupidsscope_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Resource<wbr>Group<wbr>Ids<wbr>Scope</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The rule monitors resource group IDs, separated by commas, only applies to rules created based on managed rules.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_resourcetypesscopes_csharp">
<a href="#state_resourcetypesscopes_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Resource<wbr>Types<wbr>Scopes</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">List&lt;string&gt;</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Resource types to be evaluated. [Alibaba Cloud services that support Cloud Config.](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/en/doc-detail/127411.htm)
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_risklevel_csharp">
<a href="#state_risklevel_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Risk<wbr>Level</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">int</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The risk level of the resources that are not compliant with the rule. Valid values:  `1`: critical `2`: warning `3`: info.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_sourceidentifier_csharp">
<a href="#state_sourceidentifier_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Source<wbr>Identifier</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The identifier of the rule. For a managed rule, the value is the name of the managed rule. For a custom rule, the value is the ARN of the custom rule. Using managed rules, refer to [List of Managed rules.](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/en/doc-detail/127404.htm)
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_sourceowner_csharp">
<a href="#state_sourceowner_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Source<wbr>Owner</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Specifies whether you or Alibaba Cloud owns and manages the rule. Valid values: `CUSTOM_FC`: The rule is a custom rule and you own the rule. `ALIYUN`: The rule is a managed rule and Alibaba Cloud owns the rule.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_status_csharp">
<a href="#state_status_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Status</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_tagkeyscope_csharp">
<a href="#state_tagkeyscope_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Tag<wbr>Key<wbr>Scope</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The rule monitors the tag key, only applies to rules created based on managed rules.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_tagvaluescope_csharp">
<a href="#state_tagvaluescope_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Tag<wbr>Value<wbr>Scope</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The rule monitors the tag value, use with the TagKeyScope options. only applies to rules created based on managed rules.
{{% /md %}}</dd></dl>
{{% /choosable %}}

        <span id="state_risklevel_nodejs">
<a href="#state_risklevel_nodejs" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">risk<wbr>Level</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">number</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The risk level of the resources that are not compliant with the rule. Valid values:  `1`: critical `2`: warning `3`: info.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_sourceidentifier_nodejs">
<a href="#state_sourceidentifier_nodejs" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">source<wbr>Identifier</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The identifier of the rule. For a managed rule, the value is the name of the managed rule. For a custom rule, the value is the ARN of the custom rule. Using managed rules, refer to [List of Managed rules.](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/en/doc-detail/127404.htm)
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_sourceowner_nodejs">
<a href="#state_sourceowner_nodejs" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">source<wbr>Owner</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Specifies whether you or Alibaba Cloud owns and manages the rule. Valid values: `CUSTOM_FC`: The rule is a custom rule and you own the rule. `ALIYUN`: The rule is a managed rule and Alibaba Cloud owns the rule.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_status_nodejs">
<a href="#state_status_nodejs" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">status</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_tagkeyscope_nodejs">
<a href="#state_tagkeyscope_nodejs" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">tag<wbr>Key<wbr>Scope</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The rule monitors the tag key, only applies to rules created based on managed rules.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_tagvaluescope_nodejs">
<a href="#state_tagvaluescope_nodejs" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">tag<wbr>Value<wbr>Scope</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The rule monitors the tag value, use with the TagKeyScope options. only applies to rules created based on managed rules.
{{% /md %}}</dd></dl>
{{% /choosable %}}

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">str</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The rule monitors excluded resource IDs, multiple of which are separated by commas, only applies to rules created based on managed rules, , custom rule this field is empty.

{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">str</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The frequency of the compliance evaluations. Valid values:  `One_Hour`, `Three_Hours`, `Six_Hours`, `Twelve_Hours`, `TwentyFour_Hours`. System default value is `TwentyFour_Hours` and valid when the `config_rule_trigger_types` is `ScheduledNotification`.

## Import


Cloud Config Aggregate Config Rule can be imported using the id, e.g.

```sh
 $ pulumi import alicloud:cfg/aggregateConfigRule:AggregateConfigRule example <aggregator_id>:<config_rule_id>
```
